title: Lots of issues with 10. Can I roll back to Pie?
content:
I've had nothing but issues since updating. 
Laggy performance when switching apps. 
Samsung Gear Sport battery drain (drains after 6-8 hours after it's fully charged). 
Textra app located at the bottom of the app drawer randomly disappears. 
Adaptive brightness not working. 
Wakes up instantly after I grab the phone. 
Battery life is horrible.
